body: Central American Politics reports that leaders from Guatemalan left-leaning parties have met with "representatives from the country's social organizations, unions, and peasant and environmental groups" to try to form a Broad Front for this year's legislative and presidential elections.
original_body: Central American Politics reports that leaders from Guatemalan left-leaning parties have met with "representatives from the country's social organizations, unions, and peasant and environmental groups" to try to form a Broad Front for this year's legislative and presidential elections.
title: Guatemala: The Left Unites During Election Year

sentence: Central American Politics reports that leaders from Guatemalan left-leaning parties have met with "representatives from the country's social organizations, unions, and peasant and environmental groups" to try to form a Broad Front for this year's legislative and presidential elections.
